metadata.name: Serengeti Lioness
metadata.description:
This remarkable NFT of a Serengeti lioness comes with an amazing opportunity to own the original pencil drawing, an A3 (297mm x 320mm) composition on 200g acid free cartridge paper, signed by the artist.

It will be posted to the winning bidder, anywhere in the world.

This is not a limited edition, it is a totally original piece.
